The official Amazon Black Friday Week sale is a rollin’ now, and that means we are tracking deep discounts on the entire lineup of Amazon Devices. Not only are we seeing deals starting from just $18 on its most popular Fire TV Sticks, alongside Echo smart speakers from $22, we are also seeing the first discounts on its brand new Amazon Echo Show 8/11 as well as the premium Echo Dot Max and Echo Studio. Those offers join the best price to date on its Kindle Colorsoft at $90 off, Fire HD tablets, and a whole lot more. The best Amazon Device Black Friday deals are all neatly organized and waiting for you below.

more…

items.title: Meta wants to get into the electricity trading business
items.summary: In order to accelerate the construction of new power plants needed to provide energy for its data centers, Meta is looking to get into the business of trading electricity.

items.title: Byju’s founder to appeal U.S. court order to pay over $1B in bankruptcy case
items.summary: A U.S. bankruptcy court has ordered Byju's founder Byju Raveendran to pay over $1.07 billion in a case over missing company funds.

items.title: Why now is the best time to invest in climate tech
items.summary: Global expectations around climate change has shifted dramatically in the last decade, suggesting that similarly significant changes are on the horizon.

items.title: Pew’s latest social media report shows X’s staying power in the U.S., despite competition
items.summary: X is still used by 21% of U.S. adults, Pew found, only down from 23% in 2021, despite increased competition from Meta, startups, and decentralized social media.

items.title: ecobee 2025 Black Friday deals now live: HomeKit Smart Thermostat, cams, sensors, bundles up to $120 off
items.summary:
The official ecobee Black Friday deals are now live. While the 2025 Amazon Black Friday Week sale launched already, the lauded HomeKit brand decided to hold its official Black Friday offers back a few days and now everything is live and waiting for you down below starting from $57 with as much as $120 in savings.

From top-tier fashion houses and everyday pieces for your work week, right through to super affordable pickups to freshen up your essentials, every week we scour the interwebs for the best deals on footwear and clothing to ensure you never pay full price to update your closet game.

items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly: Black Friday Week sale, 52% off Samsung Odyssey monitors, Copilot+ PCs, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. It’s officially Black Friday Week, and pretty much all major retailers like Amazon, Best Buy, Target, and Walmart have started rolling out their Black Friday offers. From gaming laptops and desktops to monitors, peripherals, and even gaming handhelds are all seeing huge markdowns right now, with many hitting fresh lows for the year’s biggest sale event. We expect more deals to pop up over the next few days leading up to the big day, but you can head below to catch all of the discounts that are now live for Black Friday in this edition of Battlestation Weekly.

more…

items.title: Electrified Weekly – expanded and increased Black Friday savings of up to 80% from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, Segway, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. This week’s best Green Deals have been centered around expanded lineups and increased savings, particularly coming from EcoFlow with up to 80% savings starting from $149 and Anker SOLIX with up to 70% savings starting from $150 – plus, the new exclusive Jackery power station lows that beat out the brand’s direct sale on the latest models. We also have expanded sales from Segway, Heybike, and many more waiting for you below.

more…

items.title: Amazon just dropped the 512GB M4 Mac mini to a new all-time low at $130 off, M4 Pro $200 off
items.summary:
We already featured the particularly notable Black Friday Week price drop on Apple’s most affordable M4 Mac mini down at $479 – this regularly $599 config almost never drops below $499, but as of this morning Amazon has now dropped the prices down even lower on some of the upgraded tiers. The M4 Pro with 24GB of RAM is still $200 off, but the 16GB/512GB and the 24GB/512GB M4 Mac mini are now sitting at some of the lowest prices we have ever tracked at $130 off. 

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – Anker 100W charger $30, polo shirts $7 each, Apple Find My trackers $2.50 apiece, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – your go-to spot for already-affordable everyday essentials that are now selling for even less. This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. Some of our most popular Steals leading up to Black Friday Week include Anker’s tiny 100W USB-C GaN charger at $30 low, this bundle of five athletic polo shirts from $7 each, and finally, some crazy pricing on four Apple Find My trackers at just $2.50 a pop. You can find these and many more down below.

more…

items.title: Samsung Black Friday: Fold 7 $400 off, Galaxy Watch 8 $50 w/ trade, Tabs, monitors $1,000 off, more
items.summary:
Samsung launched a Black Friday sale last week. At the time it was largely focused on elevated trade-in values, and some seriously notable values at that. But while those trade options are still live, it has now started to flood the official Black Friday event with straight up cash discounts on its latest foldables, the Galaxy S25 lineup, its 2025 lineup of Galaxy smartwatches, and Galaxy Tab releases of all sorts – from the flagship S11 models right down to the ultra-affordable. Scope out the details down below. 

more…

items.title: STARTS TONIGHT: Target releases giant 80-page main event Black Friday ad: Preview thousands of deals
items.summary:
Target has now officially released a preview of its upcoming main event Black Friday sale. The retailer previously unveiled some details on its month long event including a complete deal schedule for its early sale, the Deals of the Day, and the official November 27 start time of its main event Black Friday sale. But it has now issued an official press release detailing the upcoming details and when they will go live – the deals are going live this weekend.

items.title: How this founder’s unlikely path to Silicon Valley could become an edge in industrial tech
